            <h3>19-22 January 2025</h3>
            <p>This in-person four-day workshop will have a rich variety of events: plenary talks by distinguished scholars (including Prof Manjul Bhargava, Dr MD Srinivas, Prof MS Sriram, Prof K Ramasubramanian, Prof Amartya K Dutta), presentations by other scholars, release of at least two major new books, a session in remembrance of the towering scholar, the late Prof RC Gupta, results of a national quiz competition for schoolchildren on the history of Indian mathematics, interactive sessions with school students (including fun and games), etc.</p>
